full_summary:
# 5GNR Capable FieldFox Portable Spectrum Analyzer

## Government of Canada Tender Announcement

### Title
5GNR Capable FieldFox Portable Spectrum Analyzer

### Solicitation Number
NPP20230824

### Amendment Number
1

### Tender Status
Expired

### Solicitation Date
August 10, 2023

### Tender Closing Date
August 24, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)

### Expected Contract Start Date
August 30, 2023

### Expected Contract End Date
March 29, 2024

### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Notice Type
Request for Supply Arrangement

### Selection Criteria
Lowest Price

### Tender Description
Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) is pleased to issue a tender for a 5GNR Capable FieldFox Portable Spectrum Analyzer. The tender is issued against the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC (category 3.46 Spectrum analyzer) and all terms and conditions of the SA apply.

### Contracting Entity Information
Communications Research Center (CRC)
3701 Carling Avenue, Building 4
Ottawa, ON
K2H 8S2

### Goods and Services Information
The required goods and services are:
* 5GNR Capable FieldFox Portable Spectrum Analyzer
* 43 other products associated with the analyzer (listed in Annex A)

### Technical Requirements
The bidder must provide a device that meets the specifications outlined in Annexe “A”. The analyzer must have a 5GNR capabilities and must be able to perform over-the-air (OTA) measurements.

### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation criteria include:
* Technical compliance to the requirement presented herein and at Annex “A”
* Compliance to the terms and conditions of the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC

### Submissions
Submissions must be made electronically through the Canada Buys website. The deadline for submission is August 24, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Daylight Time).

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Samantha Amario
samantha.amadio@ISED-ISED.gc.ca
(343) 542-2505

### Attachment
 Copies of the tender documents are available on the Canada Buys website. [link to Annex B]

Note:
